title: Hakuouki Reimeiroku
alternative_title: Hakuoki ~Demon of the Fleeting Blossom~ Dawn of the Shinsengumi, 薄桜鬼 黎明録
description: The third season of Hakuouki continues this TV anime based on a series of bishounen games released by Idea Factory for the PlayStation 2 and PSP. This new anime tells the story of the dawning of the shinsengumi.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Historical>, <Genre -> Samurai>, <Genre -> Shoujo>, <Genre -> Supernatural>]
